sentences.en: A print of a woodcut , lithograph, or other engraved material, especially when reproduced in a book.
sentences.cn: 铅版:木刻, 平版或其它雕刻材料的印模, 尤指在书中复制时的印版.

sentences.en: A print of woodcut, lithograph, or other engraved material, especially when reproduced in a book.
sentences.cn: 准备用作印刷表面的一片金属, 塑料,橡胶, 纸板或其它材料, 例如电版或铅版.

sentences.en: Cole printed 1,000 of the cards on a lithograph stone before having them hand - colored.
sentences.cn: 科尔随即用石版印刷了1000张,之后又让人给这些卡手工着色.

sentences.en: Lithograph was introduced from China to Europe.
sentences.cn: 印刷术是从中国传入欧洲的。

sentences.en: The lithography and the manufacture technology are the lithograph most important art performance method.
sentences.cn: 石版印刷和制作技术是石版画最重要的艺术表现手段.

sentences.en: We have Own the advanced production machine in lineation, in double offset lithograph, in quarto equipments.
sentences.cn: 拥有四开胶印机 、 面双色划线机等先进的生产设备.

words.tran_cn: [印刷] 平版印刷术，石印术

trans.tran_en: a printed picture produced by lithography
